content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: dark_oak_boat
inventory=[{"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 6, "index": 20}, {"type": "granite_wall", "quantity": 42, "index": 22}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 5, "index": 29}, {"type": "acacia_fence_gate", "quantity": 53, "index": 38}, {"type": "flint_and_steel", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft the dark oak boat, I need to place 3 planks on top of each other and then 2 more planks below them in a row. Therefore, I will first move one plank to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: dark_oak_boat
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 6, "index": 20}, {"type": "granite_wall", "quantity": 42, "index": 22}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 29}, {"type": "acacia_fence_gate", "quantity": 53, "index": 38}, {"type": "flint_and_steel", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]
thought: The next plank needs to go below the first plank so I will move another plank to slot 3 which is directly below slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: dark_oak_boat
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 6, "index": 20}, {"type": "granite_wall", "quantity": 42, "index": 22}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 29}, {"type": "acacia_fence_gate", "quantity": 53, "index": 38}, {"type": "flint_and_steel", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]
thought: The third plank needs to go below the second plank so I will move another plank to slot 4 which is directly below slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: dark_oak_boat
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 6, "index": 20}, {"type": "granite_wall", "quantity": 42, "index": 22}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 29}, {"type": "acacia_fence_gate", "quantity": 53, "index": 38}, {"type": "flint_and_steel", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]
thought: The fourth plank needs to go to the right of the second plank so I will move another plank to slot 5 which is to the right of slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: dark_oak_boat
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 6, "index": 20}, {"type": "granite_wall", "quantity": 42, "index": 22}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "acacia_fence_gate", "quantity": 53, "index": 38}, {"type": "flint_and_steel", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]
thought: The fifth plank needs to go to the right of the fourth plank so I will move another plank to slot 6 which is to the right of slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 6 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: dark_oak_boat
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 6, "index": 20}, {"type": "granite_wall", "quantity": 42, "index": 22}, {"type": "acacia_fence_gate", "quantity": 53, "index": 38}, {"type": "flint_and_steel", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]
thought: The dark oak boat has been crafted and is ready to be moved to an empty slot in the inventory (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
